title: Social Studies Competency Enhancement Program through Online Collaborative Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary social studies knowledge and experience with digital tools
context.additional_context: Collaborative learning environment using real-time video conferencing tools in smartphone-centric limited-technology settings

learning_goals: Learners submit a social issue analysis report with over 90% completeness in an online collaborative group of 5 members
Learners actively participate in at least three collaborative activities (discussions/feedback) per week in Zoom breakout rooms
Learners measure group members' contribution levels with over 80% accuracy using a peer assessment rubric

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
